indications: permethrin cream 5 % w/w indicated treatment infestation sarcoptesscabiei ( scabies ) .
contraindications: adults children - thoroughly massage permethrin cream 5 % w/w skin head soles feet . scabies rarely infests scalp adults , although hairline , neck , temple , forehead may infested infants geriatric patients . usually 30 grams sufficient average adult . cream removed washing ( shower bath ) 8 14 hours . infants treated scalp , temple , forehead . one application generally curative . patients may experience persistent pruritus treatment . rarely sign treatment failure indication retreatment . demonstrable living mites 14 days indicate retreatment necessary .
warningsAndPrecautions: permethrin cream 5 % w/w available follows : 60 g tube ( ndc 21922-021-07 ) . storage store 20-25°c ( 68-77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . report suspected , contact encube ethicals private limited 1-833-285-4151or fda 1-800-fda-1088 www.fda.gov/medwatch . manufactured : encube ethicals pvt . ltd. plot . c-1 , madkaim industrial estate , madkaim , post : mardol , ponda , goa – 403 404 , india . distributed : encube ethicals , inc. 200 meredith drive , suite 202 , durham , nc 27713 usa rev 04 may 2025
adverseReactions: permethrin cream 5 % w/w contraindicated patients known hypersensitivity components , synthetic pyrethroid pyrethrin .

ingredients.name: CARBOMER HOMOPOLYMER TYPE B (ALLYL PENTAERYTHRITOL CROSSLINKED)

name: Permethrin
indications_original: Permethrin Cream 5% w/w is indicated for the treatment of infestation with Sarcoptesscabiei (scabies).
contraindications_original: Adults and children - Thoroughly massage Permethrin Cream 5% w/w into the skin from the head to the soles of the feet. Scabies rarely infests the scalp of adults, although the hairline, neck, temple, and forehead may be infested in infants and geriatric patients. Usually 30 grams is sufficient for an average adult. The cream should be removed by washing (shower or bath) after 8 to 14 hours. Infants should be treated on the scalp, temple, and forehead. ONE APPLICATION IS GENERALLY CURATIVE.  Patients may experience persistent pruritus after treatment. This is rarely a sign of treatment failure and is not an indication for retreatment. Demonstrable living mites after 14 days indicate that retreatment is necessary.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Permethrin Cream 5% w/w is available as follows:  60 g tube (NDC 21922-021-07).
                     
                     STORAGE
                      Store at 20-25°C (68-77°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature]. 
                      To report SUSPECTED ADVERSE REACTIONS, contact Encube Ethicals Private Limited at 1-833-285-4151or FDA at 1-800-FDA-1088 or www.fda.gov/medwatch.
                      Manufactured by: 
                     Encube Ethicals Pvt. Ltd.

                     Rev 04
                  May 2025
adverseReactions_original: Permethrin Cream 5% w/w is contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity to any of its components, to any synthetic pyrethroid or pyrethrin.
